General.Name: Dongfeng Automobile Co Ltd
General.Description: DongFeng Automobile Co. LTD designs, develops, manufactures, and sells automobiles, automobile engines, parts, and castings in the People's Republic of China. The company also engages in the mechanical processing, automobile repair, and technical consulting services. In addition, it manufactures and sells light-duty commercial vehicles, passenger vehicles, automobile chassis, engines, and spare parts. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China. DongFeng Automobile Co. LTD is a subsidiary of Dongfeng Motor Co. Ltd.
